title: Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When attempting to add an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog does not respond to cancellation.
EB: The progress dialog should close immediately when the cancellation button is clicked. Additionally, the exception list should not be displayed after cancellation. To achieve this, when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run, pass false for the cancellable parameter to disable the cancel button.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the breakpoints menu.
3. Click on 'Add exception breakpoint'.
4. While the progress dialog is still open, click on the cancellation button.
